LOGIN_YOUR_ACCOUNT: Log in to your account using phone number
PLEASE_ENTER_VERIFICATION_CODE: Please enter the verification code sent to
MAKE_SURE_IT_ID: Make sure it matches the name on your government ID.
WELL_EMAIL_CONFIRMATIONS: We’ll email you trip confirmations and receipts.
BY_SELECTING_TABO: By selecting Agree and continue below, I agree to Tabo’s
BY_SELECTING_TABO_LINE: Terms of Service, Payments Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Nondiscrimination Policy.
TERMS_CONDITIONS_DESCRIPTION1: By selecting Reserve, I agree to Tabo’s
NO_SAVED_ITEMS_CATEGORY: No saved items for this category
NAME: Name
SMART_BEACH_WILL_SEND_YOU_AN_SMS_MESSAGE: Smart Beach will send you an SMS Message to verify your phone number
WE_HAVE_SENT_YOU_AN_SMS_WITH_A_CODE_TO_T: We have sent you an sms with a code to the number above
TO_COMPLETE_YOUR_PHONE_VERIFICATION_PLEA: To complete your phone number verification, please enter the 4-digits activation code
SUNBEDS_TO_BE_AT_THE_FREE_UMBRELLA: Sunbeds to be at the free umbrella?
NO_BEACH_FOUND_ON_YOUR_SEARCH: No beach found on your search
TAP_ON_SUNBED_YOU_WANT_TO_ORDER: Tap on the sunbed you want to order
DO_YOU_WANT_ADDITIONAL_SUNBED: Do you want an additional sunbed?
PLEASE_USE_THE_STAR_TO_RATE_IT: Please use the star to rate it
PLEASE_TELL_US_WHAT_YOU_THINK: Please tell us what you think
COUNTRY_SUPPORT_THE_PHONE_NUMBERS_WHICH_: support the phone numbers which start with
WORKING_HOURS_OUT_OF_BOUNDS: Can't place your order because the beach is currently closed
PRESS_ONE_OF_THE_BUTTONS_TO_GET_DIRECTIO: Press one of the buttons to get directions to the beach
SELECT_THE_DAYS_WHICH_YOU_LIKE_TO_RELEAS: Select the days which you would like to release from your reservation
YOUR_REQUEST_PENDING_MESSAGE: Your request is in pending. Wait for approval from the beach
DUPPLICATED_RESERVATION_DETECT: You cannot access this beach because you have already booked with a date found in your search criteria. For view/change, tap on RESERVATION at the bottom
INFO_BEFORE_RESERVATION: In order to see the reservation section, please do a reservation first
INFO_BEFORE_MENU: The menu will be imported after you have a reservation made
INFO_RESERVATION_CARD_DETAIL: Tap on reservation card for more options
CANOTSEAT: This beach doesn't allow 2 persons to stay in both sides. Please reconsider your choosing and take a place in one of the sides
INFO1_1_CONTENT: The time you have to honor this reservation is {{number}} minutes
INFO1_2_CONTENT: If this period has passed and the beach has not confirmed that you have arrived, you have a maximum of {{number}} reservations remaining
INFO1_3_CONTENT: Failure to honor your reservation in a repeated manner will result in blocking of this account for an indefinite period of time.
INFO2_1_CONTENT: After booking confirmation from beach reception, you can order any item from the BEACH MENU section(if the beach has a bar) and the waiter will receive your orders.
INFO3_1_CONTENT: Once the reservation has been confirmed by the beach reception, you can leave this reservation at any time of the day.
INFO4_1_CONTENT: You can change the position of the chosen umbrella / baldaquin at any time of the day. Please contact the beach representant.
INFO5_1_CONTENT: If u release the reservation before {{value1}} , the beach will reward you with {{value2}} % of that day value as loyalty points. If u release a full day, the beach rewards you with {{value3}} % of that day value as loyalty points. These points you can use them later on for paying another reservation.
BEACH_CLOSED_LABEL:
Because u have selected today in your calendar range, the beach is closed and you cannot create a reservation
Please reconsider your selected days.
NO_WAITER_ERROR: There is no available waiter for your reservation. Please contact reception
YOU_HAVE_NOT_LOYALITY: {{beachName}} don't agree to pay the reservation with credit card, also you have not Loiality points on this beach.
BOOKING_CANCELED: We have no more seats for the searched period. Sorry for the inconvenience.
BOOKING_POSITION: Your reservation was changed from "old position" to "new position". If you do not agree, please cancel the reservation. Thank you.
UNREAD_RECEPTIONER: Please wait, your reservation is in pending approval. If you do not want to wait, you can press "cancel" .
NAME_LENGTH: The name must have 2 characters at least.
PAWD_LENGTH: The password must contain at least 6 characters .
GDPR_REQUIRED: Terms and conditions + GDPR are required.
PHOTO_REQUIRED: If you do not upload a profile photo, you will not be able to create reservations on some of the beaches. Would you like to sign up without a photo?
CUSTOMER_NO_PHOTO: You can not create a reservation on this beach without a photo, Do you want to add profile photo?
PLEASE_SIGN_UP_TO_ENTER_IN_A_APP: Please Sign Up to enter in a app
SHARE_LIMIT: You can add up to {{seats}} friend.
SHARE_LIMIT_P: You can add up to {{seats}} friends.
PHONE_VALIDATION: Please enter a valid phone number
GUEST_PERMISSION: You already have a reservation as a guest
BOOKING_PERMISSION: You need an account to do a booking
TOOLTIP_GIVERESERVATION: You can give your reservation to anyone, even if they don't have a Smart Beach account. Once they create an account, they will find your invitation and they can accept or cancel it. If they accept the Invitation, you will be notified and the reservation will be removed from your account.
TOOLTIP_FRIENDS: You can add your friends to your reservation up to the number of seats you have reserved.Once they accept your invitation, they will be able to order food and drinks if the beach permits.
LEAVE_BEACH_MSG: We`ve noticed that you left the beach. Are you coming back today?
EXPECT_TIME_MSG: What time do you expect to leave today?
NO_GPS_LEAVE_MSG: Because the GPS is turned off, to better facilitate the services offered by the beach, we would like to know at what time you plan on leaving the beach today.
LEFT_INFOM_MSG: Due to the information provided by you earlier, we would like to know if you left the beach.
NO_GPS_LEAVE_MSG_NEXT_DAY: Good day. As you already know, to better improve our customer services, we would like to know at what time will you be leaving the beach today
TIME_EXPIRE_TEXT: minutes remaining to complete your payment process, otherwise the reservation will expire.
PAYMENT_TIME_EXPIRED: Your reservation has expired due to exceed the counter.
CANCEL_PAID_RESERVATION: Your reservation is already paid. If you will accept to continue, the reservation will be canceled and money lost. Do you Continue?
TWISPAY_ERROR_835: The cardholder cannot supply the transaction’s amount.
TWISPAY_ERROR_836: Transaction was declined by the bank.
TWISPAY_ERROR_837: Transaction was rejected by the payment provider.
TWISPAY_ERROR_840: We have not received a ferm response from the upstream processor
PAY_RESERVE_MSG: This beach doesn't allow online bookings at this time but you can use the grid shown to see the available seats in real time..
PLEASE_UPDATE_PRIVACY_POLICY: We've updated our Privacy Policy and/or Terms and Conditions
CANT_DO_RESERVATION_TERMS_CONDITIONS: You cannot create a reservation due to Privacy Policy and/or Terms and Conditions out of date. Please update
GRID_IS_TEMPORARY_LOCKED: The beach is temporary unavailable due to beach structure changings or prices. Please try in few minutes
DELETE_PHONE_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to remove this person?
CART_REMOVE_ALERT: Are you sure you want to remove?
CANT_ORDER: Your reservation is on status {{status}}, so you can't order. To place an order, you need an `Active` reservation
MUST_HAVE_RESERVATION: You must have a reservation to order
CANCEL_UNPAID_RESERVATION: Please note that on some beaches if you cancel multiple times, you will be banned. Do you wish to continue?
NO_REVIEWS_FOR_THIS_BEACH: No reviews for this beach yet
NO_BEACH_PERMISSION_TO_BOOK: Due to the beach rules, to book online, you must first visit the beach in person
PAYMENT_SUCCESS: Your payment has been successfully processed. Thank you #sunnyfriend!
LE_BEACH_MESSAGE:
Dear #Sunnyfriend
Please note that, on this beach, each seat is for 2 people
INVITE_FRIEND_LIMIT: You have reached the maximum limit of invites
RESERVATION_FORM_HEADER: Please select you desired type of seat!
RESERVATION_FORM_BOOK_HEADER: Please select the nr. of persons
price_detail: This location requires a reservation deposit. The deposit can be only paid by credit card. The full paid amount will be refunded to you at your arrival.
price_note: Note: In case you don`t arrive in time, the amount is non-refundable.
closeday_error_info: Locaion is closed. For location schedule, please click on Info button near Calendar.
